title: Suspicious Activity
body: So my account got hacked and the hacked made 5 unauthorised purchases which were all refunded back, I asked riot if they could block my account and they said they will only block it if they sense suspicious activity . Is 5 unauthorised purchases not suspicious ? Could I even get my account suspended until I recover my account

replies.body: Support will usually ban an account when there is evidence of ongoing compromise to protect until account recovery has been completed. From what I understand from your other post they didn't ignore you, you didn't give them enough info for the account recovery.
I sent another email about it not account recovery and they ignored me
You have to use support tickets, this board can't help with such matters.
Already tried they just ignored me
